name: Sweet Slow Cooker Ham
author: smoochthechef
summary: This ham is so easy to put together and cook in a slow cooker, and with a meat thermometer you can't go wrong! The juices can be thickened with cornstarch at the end to make a glaze.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package light brown sugar, divided
1 (6 to 7 pound) bone-in picnic ham, rinsed
¾ cup chai tea latte concentrate (such as Tazo®)
directions: Spread about 3/4 of the brown sugar into the bottom of the crock of your slow cooker to cover completely
Place ham atop the brown sugar with the flat side facing down
Rub remaining brown sugar over the ham
Pour chai tea latte concentrate over the ham
Place cover on the slow cooker and cook on Low until an instant-read thermometer inserted into the center of the ham reads at least 160 degrees F (70 degrees C), about 5 1/2 hours
Baste ham once or twice with juices while cooking
